MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 7.625em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -6.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 8.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>6.67</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>6.53</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm F=mg\Rightarrow k\times\frac{q_{_1} q_{_2}}{d^2}=mg \\ \Rightarrow d=\ \sqrt{\frac{k\times q_{_1} q_{_2}}{mg}} \\ =\sqrt{\frac{9\times{10}^9\times6.67\times{10}^{-9}\times6.53\times{10}^{-9}}{0.1\times{10}^{-3}\times9.8}}=0.02\ m \ ; \ d=2cm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থায়ী দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামক আছে কোনটির?</p>

                                        <br>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি চার্জিত গোলাকার পরিবাহীর–<br>
(i) অভ্যন্তরে প্রাবল্য শূন্য&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
(ii) অভ্যন্তরে বিভব শূন্য<br>
(iii) পৃষ্ঠের সকল বিন্দুর বিভব সমান<br>
<strong>নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</strong></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>i, ii</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ii, iii</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>i, iii</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>i, ii, iii</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">চার্জিত গোলাকার পরিবাহীর পৃষ্ঠে ও অভ্যন্তরে বিভব সর্বত্র সমান। তাই অভ্যন্তরে প্রাবল্য শূন্য।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি সমবিভব তলের কেন্দ্রে তড়িৎ প্রাবল্যের মান কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="width: 4.055em; top: -3.914em; left: 0.276em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1001.05em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.05em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.664em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.558em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm E=\frac{\sigma}{2\epsilon_0} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="width: 9.019em;                                             </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="width: 4.51em; </script></span>&nbsp;যেহেতু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="width: 2.953em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="width: 6.013em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="width: 9.018em; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm p=q\times2l=It\times2l\ ;</script></span> তাই মাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="width: 2.256em;                             </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">একটি সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের প্রতিটি পাতের ক্ষেত্রফল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.04</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="width: 3.728em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.057em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.06em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-487"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.04</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-489"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.82em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.04</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm 0.04m^2</script></span>। পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব 0.002m এবং বিভব পার্থক্য 60V। ধারকের প্রতি একক ঘনমিটার আয়তনে সঞ্চিত বিভব শক্তি কত জুল?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3.18</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="width: 6.059em; 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.48em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-585"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.6em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.187</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-594"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-595"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-596"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-598"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-599"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.4em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-602"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.04</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.002</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.69em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.691em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≈</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.004</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-609"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.36em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-610"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-614"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-615"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.068em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.998em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.303em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.04</mn></mrow><mn>0.002</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>60</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3.187</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3.187</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>0.04</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.002</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>≈</mo><mn>0.004</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm E=\frac{1}{2}CV^2=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{\in_0A}{d}\times V^2 \\
=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{8.854\times{10}^{-12}\times0.04}{0.002}\times{60}^2=3.187\times{10}^{-7}\ J  \\
\therefore\frac{E}{Volume}=\frac{E}{A\times d}=\frac{3.187\times{10}^{-7}}{0.04\times0.002}\approx0.004\ {\rm Jm}^{-3} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">10 cm ব্যাসার্ধের একটি ফাঁপা পরিবাহী গোলকের পৃষ্ঠে 10C চার্জ সঞ্চিত থাকলে গোলকের কেন্দ্র হতে 10m দূরে তড়িৎ ক্ষেত্রের প্রাবল্য কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

position: relative; width: 1.687em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.68em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm 9\times{10}^9\ NC^{-1} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="width: 8.199em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 1 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>চার্জের অবস্থান সবসময়ই ধাতব বস্তুর কোন জায়গায়?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>a &amp; b</p>
</label>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 2 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>নিচের কোনটি বিন্দু চার্জের ক্ষেত্রে তড়িৎ প্রাবল্য ও দূরত্বের মধ্যে সম্পর্ক নির্দেশ করে?</p>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 10.125em; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; </span>

            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 3 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>40</mn><mi>V</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="width: 4.473em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.653em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.65em, 2.386em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.188em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-29"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-31"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-32"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>40</mn><mi>V</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">40 Vm^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;প্রাবল্যের সুষম তড়িৎ ক্ষেত্রে&nbsp;5 cm&nbsp;দূরত্বে অবস্থিত দুটি বিন্দুর বিভব পার্থক্য-</p>

                    </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>E</mi><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.55em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-36"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.05</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>E</mi><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">
V=Ed=40\times0.05=2\ V 
</script></span></p>
</span>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 4 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>বর্গক্ষেত্রের তিন কোণায়&nbsp;&nbsp;6C, 8C&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="width: 2.498em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.05em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-50"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">-2C </script></span>&nbsp;চার্জ দেওয়া আছে। চতুর্থ কোণায় কত চার্জ রাখলে কেন্দ্রে বিভব শূন্য হবে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">V=V_1+V_2+V_3+V_4=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_0r}\ \left(q_1+q_2+q_3+q_4\right) =0\\ \Rightarrow 6+8-2+q_4=0\Rightarrow q_4=-12C </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 6 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>2, 3&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3BC;</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="width: 2.275em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.87em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-201"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-203"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-204"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>μ</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">6μF</script></span>&nbsp;এর তিনটি ধারক সমান্তরাল সমবায়ে 10 V উৎসের সাথে যুক্ত।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3BC;</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="width: 2.275em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.87em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-208"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-210"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-211"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>μ</mo></mrow><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">3μF</script></span>&nbsp;ধারকটিতে আধানের পরিমাণ-</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="width: 4.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.61em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-239"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-240"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-241" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-242" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">C_2=3\mu F </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="width: 1.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.52em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-248"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-251" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19"> 3\mu F </script></span>&nbsp;ধারকের দুইপ্রান্তের বিভব পার্থক্য,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="width: 4.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.4em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-253"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-254"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-255" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-256" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">V_2=10V</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="width: 9.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1007.75em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-261"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-270"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">30</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\therefore Q_2=C_2V_2=30\mu C </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 7 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>দুইটি ধারকের একটির ধারকত্ব অপরটির দ্বিগুণ। তাদের প্রথমে সমান্তরালে এবং পরে শ্রেণিতে যুক্ত করা হলে তুল্য ধারকত্বের অনুপাত কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

vertical-align: -1.097em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>S</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>S</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">C_P=x+2x=3x,\ C_S=\left\{x^{-1}+\left(2x\right)^{-1}\right\}^{-1}=\frac{2x}{3}\therefore\frac{C_P}{C_S}=\frac{3x}{\frac{2x}{3}}=\frac{9}{2} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 8 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>1m&nbsp;বাহুবিশিষ্ট সমবাহু ত্রিভুজের তিনটি শীর্ষবিন্দুতে&nbsp;1C&nbsp;চার্জ স্থাপন করলে ত্রিভুজের ভরকেন্দ্রতে লব্ধি তড়িৎ প্রাবল্য-</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 140px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="width: 8.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1006.8em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-411"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-412"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-414"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-421"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-428"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\left|E_A\right|=\left|E_B\right|=\left|E_C\right| </script></span>&nbsp;এবং প্রত্যেকে O&nbsp;বিন্দুতে&nbsp;120°&nbsp;কোণে একে অপরের সাথে ক্রিয়া করে। লব্ধি প্রাবল্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0</mn><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="width: 3.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.62em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-433"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-436"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-438"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-439"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 9 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>এক অ্যাংস্ট্রম দূরত্বে অবস্থিত দুইটি ইলেকট্রনের মধ্যকার বির্কষণ বল কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>23.04</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="width: 25.207em;
