width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">23.04</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-544"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-545"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-547"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-548"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>23.04</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">F=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_0}\frac{q_1q_2}{r^2}=\left(9\times{10}^9\right)\times\frac{\left(1.6\times{10}^{-19}\right)^2}{\left({10}^{-10}\right)^2}N 
=23.04\times{10}^{-9}N 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যে বিভব পার্থক্য 2&nbsp;গুণ করা হলো। সঞ্চিত শক্তি পূর্বের তুলনায় কত গুণ হবে?</p>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>;</mo><mi>U</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="width: 20.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1017.13em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-569"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-570"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; </span>
                </div>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনটিকে ইলেকট্রনের আধার হিসেবে গণ্য করা হয়?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পরিবাহী গোলকের অভ্যন্তরে বিভব সর্বদা সমান। তাই প্রাবল্য শূন্য।</p>
</span>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 15 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>দুইটি পরিবাহী&nbsp;গোলকের ব্যাসার্ধ যথাক্রমে&nbsp;0.01m&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;0.02m ।&nbsp;এদের যথাক্রমে&nbsp;50C&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;100C&nbsp;চার্জে চার্জিত করা হলো। চার্জের তল ঘনত্বের অনুপাত-</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">

                    <br>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.809em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">∶</span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>σ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>σ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>50</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>∶</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\frac{\sigma_1}{\sigma_2}=\frac{Q_1}{Q_2}\times\frac{A_2}{A_1}=\frac{50}{100}\times\frac{r_2^2}{r_1^2}=2∶1 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 16 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনো পরাবৈদ্যুতিক মাধ্যমে একটি পরিবাহী গোলকের চার্জের তলঘনত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.84</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="width: 9.614em;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mrow><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>K</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo></mrow><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.84</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>260</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>8.85</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="width: 19.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1016.03em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-752"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-755" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-756" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.39em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-757"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-758"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-761" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.31em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-767"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-768"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-769"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 1.027em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1003.57em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.76em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-775"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.84</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-778" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-780"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-781"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-782"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-784"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-785"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1006.15em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -3.072em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-788"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">260</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.85</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-796" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-798" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-799"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-800"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-801"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-803"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-804"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">80</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>K</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>E</mi><mo>∈</mo></mrow><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.84</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>260</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>8.85</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">E=\frac{\sigma}{\in_0K}\Rightarrow K=\frac{\sigma}{{E\in}_0}=\frac{1.84\ \times\ {10}^{-7}}{260\ \times\ \ 8.85\ \times\ \ {10}^{-12}}=80 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 17 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>অসীম দৈর্ঘ্যের সুষমভাবে চার্জিত দন্ডের প্রতি মিটার দৈর্ঘ্যে আধান 5.6 nC হলে, দন্ডের 9 m দূরে প্রাবল্য-</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-848" style="width: 5.512em; 20.8\ {\rm NC}^{-1} 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="width: 21.969em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-905"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-907"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-908"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>λ</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">E=\frac{1}{2\pi\in_0}.\frac{\lambda}{r}=2\times9\times{10}^9\times\frac{5.6\times{10}^{-9}}{9}=11.2\ NC^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 18 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-935"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-936"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>9.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mi>V</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-55">9.8\times{10}^4Vm^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;মানের সুষম বৈদ্যুতিক ক্ষেত্র প্রয়োগ করা হয়েছে। যদি বলটি ঝুলন্ত অবস্থায় থাকে, তাহলে বলের চার্জ কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>E</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="width: 13.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1010.74em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-975"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-982" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.95em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-985"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-991"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-992"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-994"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-995"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>E</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">mg=qE\Rightarrow q=\frac{mg}{E}={10}^{-20}C</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 19 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 110px;"></p>

<p>P&nbsp;বিন্দুতে প্রাবল্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>K</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>p</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="width: 10.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.385em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1008.38em, 3.504em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1000"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.275em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1004" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1002.16em, 4.212em, -999.998em); top: -3.612em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.079em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1005"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1007" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1008"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.784em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.504em, 1000.41em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.873em; left: 0.486em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">K<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1002.27em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 2.275em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.132em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.34em, 4.249em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.833em, 1002.98em, 4.361em, -999.998em); top: -3.053em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.488em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.243em, 1002.24em, 4.361em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1016"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1018"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1019"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.635em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.171em; left: 0.337em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1023"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.432em; left: 2.349em;"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1027"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.374em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.541em, 1000.23em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.246em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.11em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.541em, 1000.23em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.11em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.37em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.153em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.374em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1003.13em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 3.132em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>K</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>p</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">E=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_0K}.\frac{p}{\left(r^2+l^2\right)^\frac{3}{2}}</script></span>&nbsp;।&nbsp;চিত্র হতে, সূত্রের r ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="width: 0.374em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.3em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1000.26em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1031"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1032" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">l</script></span> কোনটি? [ p&nbsp;তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামক]</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>O</mi><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>O</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>l</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>O</mi><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="width: 15.084em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1034"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;         <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 20 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোন সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের প্রত্যেক পাতের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="width: 3.132em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.573em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.57em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1057"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">25\ m^2 </script></span>&nbsp;এবং পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব 1 mm। প্রত্যেক পাতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>33.19</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="width: 4.734em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.877em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.88em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1061"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">33.19</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1064" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>33.19</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">33.19\ \mu C </script></span>&nbsp;চার্জ থাকলে পাতদ্বয়ের বিভব পার্থক্য কত?</p>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>33.19</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8.85</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>150</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="width: 23.568em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 19.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1019.3em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1067"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1004.67em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.375em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1117"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.85</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1120"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1121"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1122"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1124"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1125"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.52em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.518em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">150</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1133" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>33.19</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8.85</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>150</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">C=\frac{Q}{V}=\frac{\in_0A}{d}\Rightarrow V=\frac{Qd}{\in_0A}=\frac{33.19\times{10}^{-6}\times1\times{10}^{-3}}{8.85\times{10}^{-12}\times25}=150\ V </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 21 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1134" style="width: 5.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.212em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.21em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1135"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4.6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1139"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.79em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1141"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1142"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">4.6\ NC^{-1} </script></span>&nbsp;এর কোনো তড়িৎ ক্ষেত্রের সাথে&nbsp;25°&nbsp;তে থাকা&nbsp;6&nbsp;Cm&nbsp;দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামকের কোনো তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরুকে ঘুরিয়ে&nbsp;35°&nbsp;তে নিতে কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.0668</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1003.69em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1157"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.0668</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1160" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">J<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.0668</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="width: 13.977em;                         </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="width: 8.427em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1335"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1337"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1338"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>31</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">F=qE=ma\Rightarrow a=\frac{qE}{m}=\frac{1.6\times{10}^{-19}\times2}{9.1\times{10}^{-31}}=3.5\times{10}^{11}\ ms^{-2} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 23 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোন পরিবাহী গোলকের উপরিপৃষ্ঠে&nbsp;3C&nbsp;চার্জকে&nbsp;0.2cm&nbsp;সরালে কৃতকাজ = ?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পরিবাহীর উপরিপৃষ্ঠ একটি সমবিভব তল।</p>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

vertical-align: -0.664em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.836em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">
\frac{4}{1.6\times{10}^{-19}}\ N </script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="width: 2.006em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.642em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.64em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1417"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1420" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">
0\ N 
</script></span></p>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="width: 10.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1008.32em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1422"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1426" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>×</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">F=qE=0\times E=0\ N</script></span>;&nbsp;নিউট্রন চার্জহীন তাই কোন বল লাভ করবে না।&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 130px; height: 121px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>e</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>19.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>19.2</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>92.16</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="width: 18.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(4.756em, 1015.53em, 9.961em, -999.998em); top: -5.941em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.83em, 1011.56em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1466"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1468"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1469"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1470" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">v</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1473" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1003.4em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1474"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1475" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1476"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1477"><span style="display: inline-block;
