overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.945em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.798em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>e</mi><mi>v</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>19.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>19.2</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>92.16</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">C_{ev}=\left(\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{8}\right)^{-1}=1.6\ \mu F \\
Q={\rm VC}_{eq}=12\times1.6\ \mu C=19.2\ \mu C \\
\therefore U_2=\frac{1}{2}\frac{Q^2}{C_2}=\frac{1}{2}\frac{{19.2}^2}{2}=92.16\ \mu J 
</script></span></p>

width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9.6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1565" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9.6</mn><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">V_2=\frac{8}{2+8}V=9.6V</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9.6</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>92.16</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="width: 17.666em;                 </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 2 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p style="text-align: justify;">কোনো ফাঁপা পরিবাহী গোলকের পৃষ্ঠে q পরিমাণ চার্জ প্রদান করা হল। এখন একক ধনাত্মক আধানকে পরিবাহী গোলকের পৃষ্ঠের এক বিন্দু থেকে অন্য বিন্দুতে নিতে কৃতকাজ–</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শূন্য</p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অসীম</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>

                    </div>
                </div>

                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">গোলকের পৃষ্ঠে বিভব সর্বত্র সমান। তাই যেকোনো দুই বিন্দুর বিভব পার্থক্য শূন্য।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 3 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>গোলাকার পরিবাহীর ব্যাসার্ধ অর্ধেক করলে ধারকত্ব–</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দ্বিগুণ হবে</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অর্ধেক হবে</p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>এক-চতুর্থাংশ হবে</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>চারগুণ হবে</p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi></mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="width: 14.756em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-104"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.691em, 1000.17em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.768em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.08em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.54em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-134"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ϵ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.347em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.452em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm C=\frac{q}{V}=\frac{q}{\frac{1}{4\pi\epsilon_{_0}}\ \ \frac{q}{r}}=4\pi\epsilon_0r \ \therefore C \propto r </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 4 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p style="text-align: justify;">0.05m ব্যাসার্ধের একটি গোলকে 10C চার্জ দেয়া আছে। গোলকের কেন্দ্র থেকে 10m দূরে কোনো বিন্দুতে বিভব কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="width: 12.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1010.37em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-194"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-200"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-201"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm V=9\times{10}^9\times\frac{q}{r}=9\times{10}^9\ V </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 5 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোন আহিত ধারকের সঞ্চিত শক্তি নির্ভর করে–<br>
(i) সঞ্চিত আধানের উপর<br>
(ii) ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের বিভব পার্থক্যের উপর<br>
(iii) ধারকত্বের উপর<br>
<strong>নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</strong></p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 6 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>30</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="width: 2.833em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.312em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.24em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-219"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>30</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm 30\mu C</script></span> বিশিষ্ট একটি চার্জ বিদ্যুৎক্ষেত্র সৃষ্টি করে। চার্জের 15 cm এবং 8 cm দূরত্বে অবস্থিত দুইটি বিন্দুর একটি থেকে অপরটিতে একটি প্রোটন নিতে কাজের পরিমাণ কত?</p>

                    </div>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.88</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="width: 7.47em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1007.09em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -2.252em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.52</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-341"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-342"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-344"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-345"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>30</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>0.08</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>0.15</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>2.52</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm W=q\left(V_2-V_1\right)=1.6\times{10}^{-19}\times\frac{30\times{10}^{-6}}{4\pi\epsilon_0}\left(\frac{1}{0.08}-\frac{1}{0.15}\right) \\
=2.52\times{10}^{-13}\ J 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 7 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি চার্জিত সমতল পরিবাহীর সন্নিকটে তড়িৎ প্রাবল্যের মান কোনটি?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.664em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.781em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>σ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm E=\frac{3\sigma}{2\epsilon_0} </script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 8 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p style="text-align: justify;">50 cm ব্যবধানে অবস্থিত দুইটি সমান্তরাল পাতের মধ্যে তড়িৎ প্রাবল্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>400</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="width: 5.292em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.324em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1004.32em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-403"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">400</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-407"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-409"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-410"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; padding-left: 0.166em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">E</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.1em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.748em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>500</mn><mn>200</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm E=\frac{V}{d}\ ;V=Ed=400\times0.5=200V \\
C=\frac{Q}{V}=\frac{500}{200}=2.5F </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi></mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi></mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="width: 7.174em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-509"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-510"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.895em, 1000em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm C_1:C_2 = q_{_1}:q_{_2} </script></span>&nbsp;[V ধ্রুবক]&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>350</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="width: 12.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1010.29em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-514"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">350</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>350</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm \therefore C_1:C_2=250:350=5:7</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 12 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>তড়িৎবলরেখার ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সঠিক নয়?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                        </div>

                </div>

                    <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>তড়িৎ বলরেখা খোলা বক্ররেখা।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                        <span>Question 14 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p style="text-align: justify;">বিভব পার্থক্য স্থির রেখে একটি সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের মধ্যে ডাই ইলেকট্রিক পদার্থ স্থাপন করায় ধারকের সঞ্চিত শক্তি পাঁচগুণ হয়। পদার্থটির ডাই ইলেকট্রিক ধ্রুবক হবে–</p>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi></mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi></mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="width: 21.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1017.42em, 2.748em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-572"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-579"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ϵ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.7em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ϵ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi>ϵ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi></mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>ϵ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">\rm E=\frac{1}{2}CV^2=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{\epsilon A}{d}V^2\Rightarrow {E\propto\epsilon} \Rightarrow\frac{E_{_2}}{E_{_1}}=\frac{\epsilon_2}{\epsilon_1}=5 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 15 </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনো মাধ্যমের তড়িৎ মাধ্যমাঙ্ক–<br>
(i) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="width: 3.802em; (ii) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="width: 3.616em; &nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
(iii) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="width: 3.877em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.97em, 4.212em, -999.998em); top: -4.469em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.482em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-654"><span style="display: inline-block; <strong>নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</strong></p>

                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

    </div>
<div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Engineering Daily Practice Exam</h4>
                            </div>
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 1 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>100mm&nbsp;ব্যাসার্ধের &nbsp;একটি বৃত্তের পরিধিতে&nbsp;10C&nbsp;এর দুইটি চার্জ &nbsp;স্থাপন করা &nbsp;হলে, &nbsp;বৃত্তের &nbsp;কেন্দ্রে তড়িৎ বিভবের মান কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="width: 5.239em;                 <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.141em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.848em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mi>o</mi></msub><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mi>o</mi></msub><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>20</mn><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi>V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">V=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_or}\left(q_1+q_2\right)=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_or}\left(10+10\right) \\
=9\times{10}^9\ \times\frac{20}{100\times{10}^{-3}}=18\times{10}^{11}V 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 2 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>&nbsp;কোনো তড়িৎক্ষেত্রের সাথে 29°&nbsp;কোণে থাকা&nbsp;&nbsp;5.3&nbsp;Cm&nbsp;দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামকের কোনো তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরুকে ঘুরিয়ে&nbsp;39°&nbsp;কোণে নিতে যদি&nbsp;11&nbsp;J&nbsp;কাজ করতে হয়, তবে তড়িৎক্ষেত্রের মান কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21.3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="width: 19.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1015.66em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-170"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-177"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-179"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-182"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-187"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-189"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-190"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">21.3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-200"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-202"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-203"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21.3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">W=pE\left(\cos{\theta_1-\cos{\theta_2}}\right)\Rightarrow E=21.3\ NC^{-1} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 3 </span>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 4 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনো সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের প্রত্যেক পাতের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="width: 3.132em;                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mi>d</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1.77</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="width: 19.018em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.77</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-298" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সকল চার্জ গোলকের পৃষ্ঠে অবস্থান করে।</p>

clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.78em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-334"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.96em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.91em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.959em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-336"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-337"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-341"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.867em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-343"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-344"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-size: 70.7%; C^2N^{-1}\ m^{-2} 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কোনোটিই নয়</p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>তড়িৎ &nbsp;মাধ্যমাঙ্ক k একটি অনুপাত। সুতরাং এর একক নেই।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 7 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>অসীম দৈর্ঘ্যের সুষমভাবে চার্জিত দন্ডের প্রতি মিটার দৈর্ঘ্যে আধান 8.7 nC হলে দন্ডের 17 m দূরে প্রাবল্য-</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9.22</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="width: 21.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1017.99em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-400"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.52em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-405"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-408"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>সমান আকারের&nbsp;125&nbsp;টি পানির গোলক এর প্রতিটিতে সমান ও সমজাতীয় আধান আছে। এগুলো একত্রে একটি বড় গোলক তৈরী করলে বড় গোলকের ধারকত্ব প্রতিটি ছোট গোলকের ধারকত্বের কত গুণ হবে?</p>
