                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>125</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>r</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="width: 21.395em; top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-450"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-451"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-481"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>125</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>r</mi><mo>;</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3=125\times\frac{4}{3}\pi r^3\Rightarrow R=5r ;  C\propto r  \therefore C=5C_0</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 9 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>2, 3&nbsp;&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="width: 2.275em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.87em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-485"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">6\mu F</script></span>&nbsp;এর তিনটি ধারক শ্রেণী সমবায়ে&nbsp; 10V&nbsp;উৎসের &nbsp;সাথে সংযুক্ত।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="width: 2.275em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.87em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-490"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">3\mu F</script></span>&nbsp;ধারকটিতে আধানের পরিমাণ-</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>তুল্য ধারকত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="width: 7.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1006.23em, 2.953em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-515"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.035em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1002.91em, 4.428em, -999.998em); top: -3.482em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.473em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-519"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-520"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-524"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-528"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.047em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{6}}=1\mu F </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-536"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;মোট সঞ্চিত আধান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="width: 14.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1012.17em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-539"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-548"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">=Q=CV=\left(1\times10\right)\mu C =10\mu C</script></span>,&nbsp;শ্রেণীতে সংযুক্ত থাকায় প্রতিটি ধারকেই&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-560"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">10\mu C</script></span>&nbsp;আধান&nbsp;সঞ্চিত হবে।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1002.34em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-565"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\therefore3\mu F </script></span>&nbsp;ধারকটিতেও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-571"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">10\mu C</script></span>&nbsp;আধান সঞ্চিত হবে।</p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>E</mi><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>E</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>8.45</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow></msup><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="width: 19.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1015.86em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-672"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.07em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-684"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8.45</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-692"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-693"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-696"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">26</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>E</mi><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>E</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>8.45</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow></msup><mi>k</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">F=EQ=mg\Rightarrow  m=\frac{EQ}{g}=8.45\times{10}^{-26}kg </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 11 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>সমান ধারকত্বের তিনটি ধারক প্রথমে শ্রেণীতে এবং পরে সমান্তরাল সমবায়ে যুক্ত করা হলো। এদের তুল্য ধারকত্ব-এর অনুপাত কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="width: 2.234em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.824em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.78em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-717"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>9</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">
1:9 </script></span></p>
</label>
                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সমান ধারকত্বের ধারক সিরিজে লাগালে তুল্য ধারকত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="width: 1.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-722"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-723"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\frac{C}{3}\ </script></span>&nbsp;। সমান ধারকত্বের তিনটি ধারক সমান্তরালে লাগালে তুল্য ধারকত্ব&nbsp;3C।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-728"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;তুল্য ধারকত্বের অনুপাত&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>C</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="width: 6.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.25em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-731"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.8em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-735"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-736" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>C</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>C</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>9</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">=\frac{C}{3\times3C}=1:9</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 12 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 114px;"></p>

<p>তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরুটির ক্ষেত্রে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="width: 7.602em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="width: 0.598em; [&nbsp;p&nbsp;দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামক]</p>

                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2220;</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="width: 3.645em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.962em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.323em, 1002.92em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-778"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">∠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">∠</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 13 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>100V&nbsp;ব্যাটারীর দুই প্রান্তে একটি ধারক যুক্ত করায় ধারকে&nbsp;50J&nbsp;শক্তি সঞ্চিত হলো। ধারকে সঞ্চিত চার্জের পরিমাণ কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row questionOptions">
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="width: 2.188em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.778em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.78em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-828"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">10C </script></span></p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-837"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-838"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">
{10}^{-1}C </script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.28em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-843"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">

                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="width: 3.372em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-852"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-853"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-854" style="font-size: 70.7%; {10}^{-2}C 
</script></span></p>

            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>W</mi></mrow><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>50</mn></mrow><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-857" style="width: 15.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.035em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1013.03em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-858"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-859"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">Q</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">Q</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.11em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-870"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.6em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-876"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-883" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>Q</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>W</mi></mrow><mi>V</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>50</mn></mrow><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\frac{1}{2}QV=W\Rightarrow Q=\frac{2W}{V}=\frac{2\times50}{100}=1C </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 14 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>শূন্য মাধ্যমে একই দূরত্বে দুইটি &nbsp;ইলেকট্রনের মধ্যকার কুলম্ব বল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>E</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-884" style="width: 1.567em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.27em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-885"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-886"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.635em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>E</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">F_E</script></span>&nbsp;এবং মহাকর্ষ বল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                         <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                            <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>42</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="width: 5.239em; 4.2\times{10}^{42} </script></span></p>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                    <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                        <div class="input-group-prepend">
                            <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1008.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 8.527em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1026"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1027"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1029"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1030"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">42</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.448em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>E</mi></msub><msub><mi>F</mi><mi>G</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>K</mi><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mi>G</mi><mfrac><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6.673</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>31</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>42</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\frac{F_E}{F_G}=\frac{K\frac{q^2}{d^2}}{G\frac{m^2}{d^2}}=\frac{9\times{10}^9\times\left(1.6\times{10}^{-19}\right)^2}{6.673\times{10}^{-11}\times\left(9.1\times{10}^{-31}\right)^2}=4.2\times{10}^{42} </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 15 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>একটি সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যে বিভব পার্থক্য 3&nbsp;গুণ করা হলো। সঞ্চিত শক্তি পূর্বের তুলনায় কত গুণ হবে?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>;</mo><mi>U</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="width: 20.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1017.13em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1047"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1048"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">U<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 </div>
        </div>
    </div>

                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mi>E</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>75</mn><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="width: 13.568em; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>V</mi><mi>E</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>75</mn><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">E=\frac{V}{r}\Rightarrow r=\frac{V}{E}=\frac{75}{30}=2.5\ m </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C6;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.58em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1173"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">φ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1176" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1178"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1179" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>φ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>q</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\varphi=\frac{q}{\in_0}</script></span>&nbsp;প্রতি চাপে জন্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1182"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1183"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1184" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em);
