</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 19 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>কোনো পরাবৈদ্যুতিক মাধ্যমে একটি পরিবাহী গোলকের চার্জের তলঘনত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.84</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="width: 9.614em;                     <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mrow><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>K</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo></mrow><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.84</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>260</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>8.85</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="width: 19.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1016.03em, 2.666em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 1.027em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1003.57em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.76em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1243"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.84</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1248"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1249"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1250"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1252"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1253"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1006.15em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -3.072em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1256"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">260</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8.85</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1267"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1268"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1269"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1271"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1272"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 6.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">80</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>K</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>E</mi><mo>∈</mo></mrow><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.84</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>260</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>8.85</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>×</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>80</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">E=\frac{\sigma}{\in_0K}\Rightarrow K=\frac{\sigma}{{E\in}_0}=\frac{1.84\ \times\ {10}^{-7}}{260\ \times\ \ 8.85\ \times\ \ {10}^{-12}}=80 </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 84px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>3.33</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>V</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>;</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="width: 21.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1017.5em, 7.133em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1307"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.502em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.83em, 1012.42em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1308"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1310"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1311"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.879em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1003.73em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1316"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1318"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1319"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; <p><strong>Alternate</strong>:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="width: 9.715em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1402" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1407" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1408"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1409"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1411" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">250</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">J<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>C</mi><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>250</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi>J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">Q=\frac{1}{2}CV_5^2=\frac{1}{2}\times5\times{10}^2=250\mu J </script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 21 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরুর জন্য কোনো বিন্দুতে উৎপন্ন তড়িৎক্ষেত্র দূরত্বের সাথে কীভাবে সম্পর্কিত&nbsp;হবে? [ধর, বিন্দুটি অনেক দূরে অবস্থিত]&nbsp;</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi>p</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>.</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="width: 15.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1012.38em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1443"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1004.8em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.797em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1477" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 22 </span>
                        <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 94px;"></p>

<p>O&nbsp;বিন্দুটি রম্বসের কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু হলে, O বিন্দুতে লব্ধি প্রাবল্য কত?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

8.2\times{10}^9\ NC^{-1}
</script></span></p>
</label>
                            
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 123px;"></p>

top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1653"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1654"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1659"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.78em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1661"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1662"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1664" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 6.395em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -5.598em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 6.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>O</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msub><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>O</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>O</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>+</mo><msubsup><mi>E</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>O</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>4.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi><msup><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">E_{OB}=2\times9\times{10}^9\times\frac{2}{3^2}=4\times{10}^9\ NC^{-1}\\ 
E_{OA}=2\times9\times{10}^9\times\frac{2}{4^2}=2.25\times{10}^9\ NC^{-1} \\
\therefore E=\sqrt{E_{OA}^2+E_{OB}^2}=4.6\times{10}^9\ NC^{-1} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.674em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1801"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1803"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1804"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.6</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>2.3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.67</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>27</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>8</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">F=qE=ma\Rightarrow a=\frac{qE}{m}=\frac{1.6\times{10}^{-19}\times2.3}{1.67\times{10}^{-27}} 
=2.2\times{10}^8\ ms^{-2} 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 24 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>নিচের কোন লেখচিত্রটি সুষমভাবে আহিত নিরেট অপরিবাহী গোলকের জন্য প্রযোজ্য?</p>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                            <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial">
                        <span>Question 25 </span>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <p>দুইটি অসীম সমান্তরাল পাতের সুষম চার্জ ঘনত্ব যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="width: 1.641em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.529em, 1001.34em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1808"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1810" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>+</mo><mi>σ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">+\sigma </script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2013;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3C3;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1811" style="width: 1.529em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.231em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1001.23em, 2.349em, -999.998em);                 <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                    <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                    <br>
                    <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C3;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1845" style="width: 13.65em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1863" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1865" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.15em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1867"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1869"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1871" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1873" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">σ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1875"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1876" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>σ</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">E=E_1+E_2=\frac{\sigma}{2\in_0}+\frac{\sigma}{2\in_0}=\frac{\sigma}{\in_0}</script></span></p>
</span>
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Engineering Weekly Live Exam</h4>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>e</mi><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2482" style="width: 9.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.38em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2483"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2485" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2487" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2488" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2490" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2492" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.95em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.49em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2493"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2494" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2495" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">g<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>e</mi><mi>E</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>e</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">mg=eE\Rightarrow E=\frac{mg}{e} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>চার্জিত নিরেট গোলাকার পরিবাহীর অভ্যন্তরে E&nbsp;বনাম &nbsp;r এর গ্রাফ-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 105px;"></p>
</label>

                                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অভ্যন্তরে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2497" style="width: 2.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.13em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2498"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2499" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">E=0</script></span></p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2518" style="width: 15.412em; top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2519"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2520"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2522" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2529" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2530" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 1.641em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2534"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2535" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2536" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2542" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2544" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2546" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">32</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2550" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>n</mi></msup><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">q_n=\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^n.\ q_0\Rightarrow q_0=2^5\times q=32\ q </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>0.1gm&nbsp;ভরের শোলার বলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6.67</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2551" style="width: 7.975em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.522em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.52em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2552"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6.67</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2560"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2561"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2562" style="font-size: 70.7%; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-160-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mn>6.53</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2565" style="width: 7.975em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>যেহেতু প্রথম শোলার বলটি “শূন্যে ঝুলে” আছে, তাই এটি সাম্যাবস্থায় রয়েছে এবং এর উপর মোট বল&nbsp;(Force)&nbsp;শূন্য।</p>

<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 198px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi>o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2579" style="width: 19.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1016.07em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2580"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2581" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2582" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2584" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2590" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2593"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2594" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.52em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2595"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2596" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2597" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2598"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2600" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.64em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2604"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2611" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.482em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2612"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2613" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>W</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mi>o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">\therefore F-W=0\Rightarrow F=W\Rightarrow\ \frac{1}{4\pi \in_o}\ .\ \frac{q_1q_2}{d^2}=mg</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.67</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6.53</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2618" style="width: 29.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1024.1em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2619"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2629" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1007.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2670" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2675"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2676"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2678"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2679"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2680" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.67</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>6.53</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-162">\Rightarrow9\times{10}^9\times\frac{6.67\times{10}^{-9}\times6.53\times{10}^{-9}}{d^2}=0.1\times{10}^{-3}\times9.8\ \Rightarrow d=2\times{10}^{-2}m</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 23 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 94px;"></p>

<p>A ও B&nbsp;বিন্দুর মধ্যে তুল্য ধারকত্ব কত?</p>

margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.68em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.362em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2705" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.362em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2706" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.82em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2707" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2773" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>e</mi><mi>q</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>F</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>50</mn><mi>F</mi></mrow><mn>21</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">C_{eq}=\left(\frac{1}{F}+\frac{1}{2F}\right)^{-1}+\left(\frac{1}{3F}+\frac{1}{4F}\right)^{-1}
	=\frac{2F}{3}+\frac{12F}{7}=\frac{50F}{21}  
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>60</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2774" style="width: 3.132em;
