top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2775"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2778" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2779" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>60</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">60\ cm</script></span>&nbsp;দূরত্বে অবস্থিত&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-169-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2780" style="width: 4.473em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.653em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.65em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2781"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2785" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2786" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>+</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-169">+0.1\ \mu C</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2787" style="width: 4.212em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.43em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.43em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2788"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2791" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2792" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রত্যেক চার্জ হতে মধ্যবিন্দুর দূরত্ব,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2912" style="width: 1.15em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2922" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2923"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2924" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">\therefore </script></span>&nbsp;লব্ধি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামকের দিক-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ধনাত্মক চার্জ হতে ঋণাত্মক চার্জের দিকে</p>
</label>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ঋণাত্মক চার্জ হতে ধনাত্মক চার্জের দিকে</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দিক নেই</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো গোলাকার ধারকের ব্যাসার্ধ দ্বিগুণ করা হলে এর ধারকত্ব-</p>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1.5&nbsp;cm&nbsp;ব্যাসার্ধের কোনো গোলাকার পরিবাহীকে এমনভাবে আহিত করা হল যেন এর পৃষ্ঠে বিভব হয়&nbsp;11&nbsp;V&nbsp;। তাহলে এর কেন্দ্রে প্রাবল্য কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পৃষ্ঠে বিভব = কেন্দ্রে বিভব। তাই প্রাবল্য শূন্য।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 28 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ব্যাটারির সাথে যুক্ত একটি সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের মধ্যবর্তী স্থানে একটি পরাবৈদ্যুতিক মাধ্যম স্থাপন করা হল। মাধ্যমের পরাবৈদ্যুতিক ধ্রুবক 7&nbsp;হলে সঞ্চিত শক্তি কতগুণ &nbsp;হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>7</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>49</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-187">\frac{W_2}{W_1}=\frac{C_2}{C_1}=7=k</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 137px;"></p>

<p>চিত্রে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3128" style="width: 1.38em; top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3129"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3130"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.45em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3131" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>a</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3152" style="width: 14.018em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3165"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3180" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3183" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3184" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3185" style="font-size: 70.7%; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3187" style="width: 2.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.13em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3188"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3189" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">V<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.207em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>D</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-195">q_A+q_B+q_C+q_D=0\Rightarrow q_D=-5-3+1=-7C</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 30 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 104px;"></p>

<p>চিত্রের সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব&nbsp;20 mm&nbsp;ও ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-196-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3226" style="width: 3.467em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.833em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.83em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3227"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3230"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.306em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.86em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3231" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.896em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-196">0.4\ m^2 </script></span>&nbsp;হলে ধারকত্ব কত?</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>m</mi><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>t</mi><mi>K</mi></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">A=0.4\ m^2\ ;t=2\times{10}^{-3}\ m\ ;K=5\ ;d=20\times{10}^{-3}\ m \\
C=\frac{\in_0A}{d-t+\frac{t}{K}}=\frac{8.854\times{10}^{-12}\times0.4}{20\ \times\ {10}^{-3}\ -2\times{10}^{-3}+\frac{2\ \times{10}^{-3}}{5}} 
=1.925\times{10}^{-10}\ \ F 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>তিনটি ধারকের শ্রেণি সংযোগে তুল্য ধারকত্ব&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3414" style="width: 2.61em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.126em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.13em, 2.573em, -999.998em); vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">1\ \mu F</script></span>&nbsp;। দুইটি ধারকের মান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3420" style="width: 2.275em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3448" style="width: 2.552em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.097em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.1em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3449"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3452" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3453" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.093em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.225em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-208"> 
6\ \mu F 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3498" style="font-size: 70.7%; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi>F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-209">\frac{1}{C_P}=\frac{1}{C_1}+\frac{1}{C_2}+\frac{1}{C_3}\Rightarrow1=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{C_3}\Rightarrow C_3=6\ \mu F </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সমভাবে আহিত দুটি পিথবল বায়ুতে&nbsp;2 mm&nbsp;ব্যবধানে রাখলে পরস্পরকে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-210-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3504" style="width: 5.926em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.845em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.85em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3505"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3507" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3508" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3509"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3510"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3512"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3513"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3515" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3517" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">N<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.076em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-210">4\times{10}^{-5}\ N </script></span>&nbsp;বলে বিকর্ষণ করে। প্রতিটি বলে আধানের পরিমাণ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-215-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3566" style="width: 14.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1012.22em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3567"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3568" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3570" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3572" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3573"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3574" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3575" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.482em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3576"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3577" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3578" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3580" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.33</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3584" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3585"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3586"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3588"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3589"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3590" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3591" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3593" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.33</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-215">F=C\times\frac{q^2}{d^2}\Rightarrow q=1.33\times{10}^{-10}\ C </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-216-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3594" style="width: 3.653em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1002.98em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3595"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3596"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3597"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3598"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3600"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3601"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3602" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3605" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-216">{10}^{-4}\ C </script></span>&nbsp;মানের দুটি বিপরীত চার্জ দ্বারা গঠিত যাদের মধ্যবর্তী&nbsp;দূরত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-217-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3606" style="width: 2.498em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.01em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3607"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3610" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3611" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>c</mi><mi>m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-217">2\ cm</script></span>&nbsp;। তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরুটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-223-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3643" style="width: 30.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1024.71em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3644"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3645" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">W<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3674" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3675"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3676"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3678"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3679"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3680" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3681" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3683" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3684"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3685"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3687"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3688"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3689" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3690" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3692" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3693"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3694"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3696" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3698" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">J<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3702" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">J<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><msub><mi>θ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-223">W=pE\left(\cos{\theta}-cos\theta_0\right)=2pE=2\times2\times{10}^{-2}\times{10}^{-4}\times{10}^5\ J=0.4\ J </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের পাতদ্বয়ের মাঝখানে 5&nbsp;তড়িৎ মাধ্যমাঙ্কের পরাবৈদ্যুতিক মাধ্যম স্থাপন করা হলে সঞ্চিত শক্তি কত গুণ হবে? [উভয়ক্ষেত্রে পাতদ্বয়ে সঞ্চিত আধানের পরিমাণ সমান।]</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3742"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; <p>Now,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-229-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0026;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3749" style="width: 17.953em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3868" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3869" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.633em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -3.248em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mfrac><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>k</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-230">\Rightarrow V_2=\frac{V_1C_1}{C_2}=\frac{V_1C_1}{kC_1}=\frac{V_1}{k} \\
\therefore U_2=\frac{1}{2}kC_1\frac{V_1^2}{k^2}=\frac{1}{k}\times U_1\Rightarrow\frac{U_2}{U_1}=\frac{1}{k}=\frac{1}{5}  
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
<div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h4>Varsity Weekly MCQ Live Exam W-06 (10)</h4>
                            </div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 1 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>+Q চার্জ থেকে r দূরত্বে A বিন্দুতে বিভব +2V ; অসীম থেকে +2C চার্জ A বিন্দুতে আনতে কত কাজ করতে হবে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>2 Q</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 10.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.57em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-8" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-9" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-10" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-11" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-14" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-15" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm W=∆Vq=2(2)J=4 J </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 2 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোনো সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকে নির্দিষ্ট বিভবে সঞ্চিত শক্তি দ্বিগুণ করতে হলে-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাতের ক্ষেত্রফল দ্বিগুণ করতে হবে</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাতের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব অর্ধেক করতে হবে</p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                        <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>A and B</p>

        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>U</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.26em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-18"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">U</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-25"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm U=\frac{1}{2}CV^2\ ;</script></span>&nbsp;C&nbsp;দ্বিগুণ করলে U দ্বিগুণ হবে।</p>

<p>আবার,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="width: 4.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1003.45em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-31"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-35"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-36"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.527em, 1000.41em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∈</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mo>∈</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm C=\frac{\in_oA}{d}\ ;</script></span>&nbsp;d&nbsp;অর্ধেক করলে C দ্বিগুণ হবে।</p>

<p>অথবা, A দ্বিগুণ করলে C দ্বিগুণ হবে।</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 3 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="width: 4.1em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="width: 2.461em;                 </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>11</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="width: 5.239em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-65"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-66"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-size: 70.7%;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em);
