clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-151"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-152"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mo>∈</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm V=V_1+V_2=\frac{1}{4\pi\in_o}\ .\ \frac{q_1}{r}+\frac{1}{4\pi\in_o}\ .\frac{q_2}{r}=9\times{10}^9</script></span></p>

</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 4 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 132px;"></p>

<p>ABC সমবাহু ত্রিভুজের A ও B বিন্দুতে +q&nbsp;ও <!--[if gte msEquation 12]><m:oMath><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Cambria Math",serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"MS Mincho";mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri;mso-bidi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:
AR-SA'><m:r><m:rPr><m:scr m:val="roman"/><m:sty m:val="p"/></m:rPr>-</m:r><m:r><m:rPr><m:scr
m:val="roman"/><m:sty m:val="p"/></m:rPr>q</m:r></span></m:oMath><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape

</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

        </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

 E_1=E_2=E </script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p>বলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="width: 10.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.814em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.81em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-354"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-355"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-364"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-365"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-369"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-371"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-372"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm E_r=E=4.5\times{10}^6NC^{-1}</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 5 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>গোলকীয় পরিবাহীর ব্যাসার্ধের সাথে ধারকত্বের সম্পর্কসূচক লেখচিত্র নিচের কোনটি?</p>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.97em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-376"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm C\propto r </script></span></p>

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 6 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2013;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="width: 5.516em;             </div>

top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-429"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                         <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                    </div>

            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="width: 5.467em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C6;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="width: 22.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1018.49em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-466"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">φ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; clip: rect(3.035em, 1004.43em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-479"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-481"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>φ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2000</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm \varphi=EAcos\theta=2000\times\left(5\times{10}^{-3}\right)^2\times cos60° NC^{-1}m^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C6;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="width: 11.355em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1009.3em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-513"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">φ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-520"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-521"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-523"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-524"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-529"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-531"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-532"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-535"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 7 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 84px;"></p>

<p>প্রতিটি ধারকের ধারকত্ব <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.014em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.98em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-539"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm 1\ \mu F</script></span> হলে পুরো সিস্টেমের তুল্য ধারকত্ব কত হবে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="width: 16.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1013.24em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-572"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-573"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-592"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-596"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm C_p=1+1=2\ \mu F\ ;C_s=\frac{2\times1}{2+1}=\frac{2}{3}\mu F </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 8 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p style="text-align: justify;">একটি তড়িৎ দ্বিমেরু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="width: 5.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.36em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-607"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-612"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-614"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-615"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm 2\times{10}^{-2}C</script></span> মানের দুটি বিপরীত চার্জ দ্বারা গঠিত এবং তাদের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="width: 2.684em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.2em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.2em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-620"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm 1\ \mu m</script></span>। বাধাহীনভাবে দ্বিমেরুটি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="width: 6.82em;                 </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="width: 19.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1015.86em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-680"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-691"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-692"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-699"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-700"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>0</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm W=-pE[cos180°-cos0°]=-pE[(-1)-1]</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi><mi>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi>E</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="width: 9.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.46em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-716"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="width: 15.617em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="width: 11.15em;             </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 9 </span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>অসীম দৈর্ঘ্যের চার্জিত লম্বা চোঙের অক্ষ থেকে নির্দিষ্ট দূরত্বে তড়িৎ ক্ষেত্র প্রাবল্য নির্দেশ করে কোনটি?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mi>&amp;#x03F5;</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="width: 2.461em;                     <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="width: 1.869em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.505em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.46em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-852"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm CO </script></span></p>
</label>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="width: 2.416em;             <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="width: 13.035em;                                 <h4>Varsity Weekly Practice Exam W-06 (10)</h4>

            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 1 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>+Q চার্জ থেকে d দূরত্বে A বিন্দুতে তড়িৎক্ষেত্রের প্রাবল্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 6.634em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.442em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1005.4em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.71em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-8"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-9"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-10" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-11" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm +2NC^{-1};\ \ A</script></span>বিন্দুতে +3C চার্জ রাখলে সেটি কত বল অনুভব করবে?</p>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="width: 11.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.22em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-17"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-25"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">N</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm F=qE=\left(2\times3\right)N=6\ N </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 2 </span>
                    <span style="float: right !important; border-bottom:0px; color: #8d8d8d">Skipped</span>
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>একটি সমবাহু ত্রিভুজের তিনটি শীর্ষবিন্দুতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="width: 5.367em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.398em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1004.32em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-36"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm qC,\ -qC</script></span> ও qC&nbsp;আধান রয়েছে। প্রতিটি বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;2 μm হলে তুল্য দ্বিমেরু ভ্রামকের মান কত হবে?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
