            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 163px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="width: 12.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.12em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-85"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-86"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-99"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm p_1=q_1\times2l=\left(q\times2\right)C\mu m\ ;</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="width: 11.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.8em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-110"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-111"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-124"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm p_2=q_2\times2l=\left(q\times2\right)C\mu m</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="width: 12.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1010.33em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-133"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-137"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-138"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-150"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-151"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-160"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-161"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>30</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm \therefore p_{net}=p_1cos30°+p2cos30°</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="width: 13.65em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1011.19em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-164"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-173"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-179"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-180"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm =2\times q\times2\times\frac{\sqrt3}{2}=2\sqrt3q\ C\mu m</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 3 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 250px; height: 52px;"></p>

<p>A ও B&nbsp;এর মধ্যে তুল্য ধারকত্ব কত হবে? [প্রতিটি ধারকের ধারকত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.014em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.98em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-188"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm2\ \mu F</script></span>]</p>

                </div>
            </div>

                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 200px; height: 90px;"></p>

<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 48px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="width: 17.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1013.89em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-194"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-195"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm C_p=C_1+C_2+C_3=2+2+2=6\ \mu F</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 4 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোন সমান্তরাল পাত ধারকের ধারকত্ব ও পাতদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্বের মধ্যে সম্পর্কসূচক লেখচিত্র নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="width: 2.871em; <div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 5 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 124px;"></p>

<p>ABCD বর্গক্ষেত্রের A ও C বিন্দুতে অবস্থিত +q চার্জের জন্য D বিন্দুতে উভয়ক্ষেত্রেই <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="width: 7.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.447em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.45em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-229"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-230"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.45em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-231"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.49em, 3.839em, -999.998em); top: -4.544em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.094em, 1000.86em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -4.022em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-235"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-236"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-240"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.71em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-242"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-243"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                 </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="width: 8.472em;                     </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="width: 4.738em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-346"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-353"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-354"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-358"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-360"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-361"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm E_r=\sqrt2E=2\times{10}^6NC^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 6 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>4π সে.মি. পরিধির বৃত্তের ওপর দুইটি বিন্দুতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="width: 3.206em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.61em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.53em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-365"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm -2\mu C</script></span> ও +3μC চার্জদ্বয় রাখা হলে কেন্দ্রে মোট বিভব-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                <br>
                <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><msub><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="width: 15.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1012.67em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-413"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-521"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-522"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-523"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-525"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-526"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.953em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-535"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-536"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm =9\times{10}^9\times\left[\frac{-2\times{10}^{-6}}{\frac{4\pi}{2\pi}\times{10}^{-2}}+\frac{3\times{10}^{-6}}{\frac{4\pi}{2\pi}\times{10}^{-2}}\right]V=4.5\times{10}^5V</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 7 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>0.167 m<sub>&nbsp; </sub>ব্যাসার্ধের একটি গোলকের কেন্দ্রে 8.854μC একটি চার্জ স্থাপন করলে গোলকের পৃষ্ঠ দিয়ে অতিক্রান্ত তড়িৎ ফ্লাক্স কত?</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row questionOptions">

                    <div class="input-group-prepend">
                        <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                        <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="width: 6.56em;         </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C6;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="width: 17.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1014.43em, 2.871em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-689"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-690"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-695"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-697"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-698"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-701"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>φ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>8.854</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm \therefore\varphi=\frac{8.854\times{10}^{-6}}{8.854\times{10}^{-12}}NC^{-1}m^2={10}^6\ NC^{-1}m^2</script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="row question">
        <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="serial">
                    <span>Question 8 </span>
                    
                </div>
                <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                    <p>কোনো গোলকীয় ধারকে চার্জ দ্বিগুণ করে এর ব্যাসার্ধ দ্বিগুণ করা হলে সঞ্চিত শক্তি পূর্বের-</p>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.56em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-755"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-756" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-757" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm \frac{U_2}{U_1}=\frac{Q_2^2}{2C_2}\times\frac{2C_1}{Q_1^2}=\frac{Q_2^2r_1}{Q_1^2r_2}=\frac{2^2}{2}=2 </script></span></p>
</span>
            </div>
    </div>
</div>
